# High Jumper (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*High Jumper (Ex):* When a ninja with this trick makes a high jump, the DC for that jump is half the normal DC. The ninja must have the [[Acrobatic Master (Ninja Trick)|acrobatic master]] trick before taking this talent.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 15
